biotools.summary: A plug-in to the Galaxy bioinformatics workbench which enables visualization of mass spectrometry-based proteomics data integrated with genomic and/or transcriptomic sequencing data.  Useful for verifying quality of results and characterizing novel peptide sequences identified using a multi-omic proteogenomic approach.

bioschemas.name: Multi-omics Visualization Platform
bioschemas.summary: A plug-in to the Galaxy bioinformatics workbench which enables visualization of mass spectrometry-based proteomics data integrated with genomic and/or transcriptomic sequencing data.
